pageContext.claim: “My Administration has engaged with key European allies in seeking to secure a new supplemental agreement that would impose new multilateral sanctions if Iran develops or tests long-range missiles, thwarts inspections, or makes progress toward a nuclear weapon—requirements that should have been in the nuclear deal in the first place.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has demanded a new deal with Iran, but it's a stretch to say the administration has engaged with European allies on this matter in a substantive way. There is little interest among the Europeans to renegotiate the agreement, which took many years of hard negotiations.
